# Library Yang Dibutuhkan
```c
#include <Arduino.h>
#include <ESP8266WiFi.h>
#include <Hash.h>
#include <ESPAsyncTCP.h>
#include <ESPAsyncWebServer.h>
#include <Adafruit_Sensor.h>
#include <DHT.h>
#include <ESP8266mDNS.h>
```

# Pin Sensor Mapping
<b>Nodemcu</b>
<pre>
[Relay - Nodemcu]
VCC -> VCC
GND -> GND
SIGNAL -> D6

[DHT 11 - Nodemcu]
VCC -> VCC
GND -> GND
DATA -> A0

</pre>

<b>Arduino Nano</b>
<pre>
[Soil Moisture - Arduino]
VCC -> VCC
GND -> GND
A0 -> A0
</pre>


# Nodemcu Codes
```c
#include <Arduino.h>
#include <ESP8266WiFi.h>
#include <Hash.h>
#include <ESPAsyncTCP.h>
#include <ESPAsyncWebServer.h>
#include <Adafruit_Sensor.h>
#include <DHT.h>
#include <ESP8266mDNS.h>

#define temp 0
#define pipe 6

#define DHTTYPE    DHT11

// [ OLD Code ] Server Initialitation
//ESP8266WebServer server(80);
AsyncWebServer server(80);
DHT dht(temp, DHT11);

float temp_value = 0.0;
float humidity_value = 0.0;

unsigned long interval = 10000;
unsigned long previousMillis = 0;

char* ssid = "GreenHouse";
char* pass = "greenhousekgr";

String processor(const String& var){
  //Serial.println(var);
  if(var == "TEMPERATURE"){
    return String(temp_value);
  }
  else if(var == "HUMIDITY"){
    return String(humidity_value);
  }
  return String();
}

<script>
setInterval(function ( ) {
  var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
  xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
    if (this.readyState == 4 && this.status == 200) {
      document.getElementById("temperature").innerHTML = this.responseText;
    }
  };
  xhttp.open("GET", "/temperature", true);
  xhttp.send();
}, 10000 ) ;

setInterval(function ( ) {
  var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
  xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
    if (this.readyState == 4 && this.status == 200) {
      document.getElementById("humidity").innerHTML = this.responseText;
    }
  };
  xhttp.open("GET", "/enviroment", true);
  xhttp.send();
}, 10000 ) ;
</script>
</html>
)rawliteral";

void setup(){
Serial.begin(115200);
dht.begin();

pinMode(temp, INPUT);
pinMode(pipe, OUTPUT);
pinMode(2, OUTPUT);

Serial.println("[-------------------------------]");
Serial.println("[ Mesin : Nodemcu ESP8266 ]");
Serial.println("[ Sensor : DHT11 ]");
Serial.println("[ Sensor : Relay ]");
Serial.println("[-------------------------------]");

if(WiFi.softAP(ssid, pass)){
  Serial.println("[+] Successfully created connection");
  Serial.print("[-] IP : ");
  Serial.println(WiFi.localIP());
  Serial.print("[*] SSID : ");
  Serial.println(ssid);
  Serial.print("[#] PASS : ");
  Serial.println(pass);
  digitalWrite(2, HIGH);
}

 if (MDNS.begin("greenhouse")) {
    Serial.println("[+] Server is online!");
  }

 server.on("/", HTTP_GET, [](AsyncWebServerRequest *request){
    request->send_P(200, "text/html", index_html);
  });
  
  server.on("/monitor", HTTP_GET, [](AsyncWebServerRequest *request){
    request->send_P(200, "text/html", monitoring_html, processor);
  });

  server.on("/pipeon", HTTP_GET, [](AsyncWebServerRequest *request){
    digitalWrite(pipe, LOW);
    request->send_P(200, "text/plain", "{ Pipe_Status : ON }");
  });

  server.on("/pipeoff", HTTP_GET, [](AsyncWebServerRequest *request){
    digitalWrite(pipe, HIGH);
    request->send_P(200, "text/plain", "{ Pipe_Status : OFF }");
  });
  
  server.on("/temperature", HTTP_GET, [](AsyncWebServerRequest *request){
    request->send_P(200, "text/plain", String(temp_value).c_str());
  });
  
  server.on("/humidity", HTTP_GET, [](AsyncWebServerRequest *request){
    request->send_P(200, "text/plain", String(humidity_value).c_str());
  });

  server.on("/enviroment", HTTP_GET, [](AsyncWebServerRequest *request){
    if(Serial.available()){
      float get_sensor = Serial.read();
      request->send_P(200, "text/plain",  String(get_sensor).c_str());
    }else{
      request->send_P(200, "text/plain", "{ Error: Error konek ke arduino, cek lagi wiring nya! }");
    }
  });

/*
server.on("/", [](){
  server.send(200, "text/plain", "{ Server: greenhouse }");
});

server.on("/temperatur", temp_sensor);
server.on("/lampu/on", lampu_on);
server.on("/lampu/off", lampu_off);
server.on("/kelembapan", kelembapan);

*/

server.begin();
}

void loop(){
  /*
  server.handleClient();
  */
  
  MDNS.update();
  unsigned long currentMillis = millis();
  if (currentMillis - previousMillis >= interval) {
    
    previousMillis = currentMillis;
    
    float newT = dht.readTemperature();
    if (isnan(newT)) {
      Serial.println("Failed to read from DHT sensor!");
    }
    else {
      temp_value = newT;
      Serial.println(temp_value);
    }
    // Read Humidity
    float newH = dht.readHumidity();
    // if humidity read failed, don't change h value 
    if (isnan(newH)) {
      Serial.println("Failed to read from DHT sensor!");
    }
    else {
      humidity_value = newH;
      Serial.println(humidity_value);
    }
  }
  
  if(Serial.available()){
     int get_sensor = Serial.read();
     int limit = 300; 
     if(get_sensor < limit){
       digitalWrite(pipe, LOW);
     }else{
       digitalWrite(pipe, HIGH);
     }
  }else{
     Serial.println("{ Error: Error konek ke arduino, cek lagi wiring nya! }");
   }
}
```

# Arduino Codes
```c
#define sensor A0

void setup(){
Serial.begin(115200);
pinMode(sensor);

Serial.println("[---------------------]");
Serial.println("[ Mesin : Arduino ]");
Serial.println("[ Sensor : FC-28 ]");
Serial.println("[---------------------]");

}

void loop(){
float read_data = analogRead(sensor);
Serial.println(read_data);
}
```
